entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 p.m. NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
